idea-plugin.name: Icons for Java annotations
idea-plugin.description:
IDE icons for @Experimental and @Beta Java annotations
When this annotations are detected by the plugin, it show an icon in the IDE gutter. This plugin is compatible with IntelliJ and Android Studio.

To see the documentation and more examples see here
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Release notes:
  • Show a tooltip when the mouse is over the icon
  • At this moment we only detect annotations in methods
